subject: Re: Business sponsorship!! Get up
body:
Dear Friend,



It is our great honor to be your financial giant by sponsoring you
financially. We are a private commercial sponsor. We sponsor business
oriented individuals by providing them with financial sponsorship to setup
new business, carry out their business projects or strengthen the old
business that is facing financial difficulties. We can sponsor you with any
amount starting from $1 million usd and not exceeding $20 million usd for a
start provided we can rely on your ability to pay back our money within the
stipulated period of 10years. Our sponsorship is for a maximum period of
10years with an interest rate of 3% of the total amount we aided you per
year, which is 0.25% monthly. The interest rate of 0.25% can be paid to us
monthly or every three (3) months or annually. For first time customers the
interest rate counting begins after three (3) months from when customer
receives money from us, while the sponsorship amount is to be paid back to
us at the end of the 10years sponsorship period. Meaning as a first time
customer you will not be charge interest for the first Three (3) months
this is to enable you invest the funds properly and balance your business
before demanding interest payment from you. We might be expensive but we
are reliable. Our sponsorship collateral is scan copy of your valid
international passport.

We can sponsor you in any part of the world as we have agents all over the
world through who helps us to monitor our clients all over the world. To
protect our funds and business, during the sponsorship period an agent will
be assigned to you, this agent shall be contacting and visiting you
periodically to ensure the safety of our funds.



We do not relent in funding as we can fund you as long as you need us. The
sponsorship period can be rolled over at the end of the first 10years if
you wish to continue with us.



If you are interested to deal with us kindly furnish us with the below
required details as our official requirements to enable us start the
processing of your requested sponsorship amount*.*



Company Name (if available):...........

First Name:.................

Middle Name:...........

Last Name:.......

Age:.............

Sex:....................

Marital Status:............

Office Phone / Fax:..........

Mobile:..............

Current Contact Address:.......

City:......................

State/Province:............

Country:...................

Occupation:..............

Monthly Income……..

Annual Income:......................

Sponsorship Amount needed:……………..



 Once we are in receipt of the above details from you, we will send you the
sponsorship calculation/repayment draft.



Sincerely Yours,

Monebglobal Team
